document_data.name: Kerbin Dellmon
document_data.mainbody: '''Kerbin Dellmon''' was the patriarch of the [[Dellmon]] family and a farmer during the [[Elemental Evil]] crisis.
document_data.Activitivies: Kerbin managed a great farm in the valley.
document_data.History: In [[1491 DR]], the [[Iceshield]] [[orc]]s attacked many farms around the Dellmon property. However, Kerbin refused to abandon his farm and go to [[Yartar]]. So he remained with his workers and family to defend it. With the lucky arrival of some adventurers, he was able to defend the farm.
